title: Cavaliers' Komoroski on Economic Growth in Cleveland (Audio)
itunes:title: Cavaliers' Komoroski on Economic Growth in Cleveland (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Cleveland Cavaliers and Quicken Loans Arena CEO Len Komoroski on the upcoming season, and the business landscape and economic growth in Cleveland.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
